Player History
Released by Halifax on 4/7/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/16/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $444,600 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/3/1981, off Michael Feist (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/29/1981, off Manuel Cortes (WIS)...
Traded from Bay City to Malibu on 2/5/1983 (Going to BC: P R. Higa, 1B H. Yan, 2B J. Pinney. Going to Mal: 2B C. Few, C R. Ambriz)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1985...
Drove in 7 runs against Plum Grove on 9/24/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1987, hitting .368 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/1/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
